name: Contextos - Cooperativa para o Desenvolvimento e Coesão Social CRL
membership:
Anna Lindh Foundation - http://www.euromedalex.org/
European Alternatives - https://euroalter.com/
goal:
Contextos is a well-established cooperative located in Faro, Portugal. It was founded in 2016. Contextos aims at fostering and supporting the empowerment of youth generations as the keystone of processes of change in the society, to stimulate active participation of youngsters in different fields of interest in order to fulfill their entire potential and assure sustainable development of their communities. Our projects focus on: democratic education, citizenship, youth employment, human rights, intercultural dialogue, learning, entrepreneurship, social inclusion, etc.
We cooperate with public institutions especially at a local and regional level, schools, universities, vocational and other educational institutions, public and private social inclusion organizations and other NGO's.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, International co-operation and development, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: At the moment we are not following any EU initiatives, policies and legislative dossiers.
